description: Write a function that checks if a `hostname` matches any string in the `denied_domains` list (case-insensitive). `denied_domains` is a NULL-terminated array. Example (Denied): is_hostname_in_list("localhost", ["localhost", "127.0.0.1", NULL]) -> 1. Example (Allowed): is_hostname_in_list("google.com", ["localhost", "127.0.0.1", NULL]) -> 0.
